data Expr

  • | BoolLit Bool Label

  • | Or Expr Expr Label
  • | Not Expr Label
  • | NumLit Int Label
  • | RandomNum Label

  • | Sub Expr Expr Label
  • | Mul Expr Expr Label
  • | Div Expr Expr Label
  • | Eq Expr Expr Label
  • | Lt Expr Expr Label
  • | Throw Text Expr Label
name: Expr Throw Lt Mul Sub Add RandomNum NumLit Or And BoolLit Not Eq Div Var

data Statement

  • | Begin [Statement] Label
  • | TryCatch Statement Text Text Statement Label
  • | Finally Statement Statement Label
name: Statement Finally TryCatch Begin Assign While If

class Arrow c => IsVal v c | c -> v where
  • type JoinVal (c :: * -> * -> *) x y :: Constraint
  • boolLit :: c (Bool, Label) v
  • and :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • or :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • not :: c (v, Label) v
  • numLit :: c (Int, Label) v
  • add :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • sub :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • mul :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • div :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • eq :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • lt :: c (v, v, Label) v
  • if_ :: JoinVal c (x, y) z => c x z -> c y z -> c (v, (x, y)) z
name: IsVal sub numLit boolLit lt add mul if_ eq div or and not JoinVal
